<?php

echo implode(', ', $squared);
?>

?>

<?php
class Car {
    public $brand;

    public function __construct($brand) {
        $this->brand = $brand;
    }

    public function honk() {
        echo "Beep! I am a " . $this->brand . ".";
    }
}

$myCar = new Car('Toyota');
$myCar->honk();
